APP_ID.description: You api id, from my.telegram.org or @ScrapperRoBot.

API_HASH.description: You api hash, from my.telegram.org or @ScrapperRoBot.

STRING_SESSION.description: Your session string. Can be added now, or after deploy. (The bot will NOT work without a session string!!)

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Heroku API token. Needed if deploying on heroku ONLY.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Name of your heroku app, given in the first blank on this page. To be added if deploying to heroku ONLY.

COMMAND_HANDLER.description: Your session string. Can be added now, or after deploy. (The bot will NOT work without a session string!!)

SUDO_COMMAND_HANDLER.description: Your session string. Can be added now, or after deploy. (The bot will NOT work without a session string!!)

EXTERNAL_REPO.description: Your session string. Can be added now, or after deploy. (The bot will NOT work without a session string!!)

BADCAT.description: Your session string. Can be added now, or after deploy. (The bot will NOT work without a session string!!)
